TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public Class SubMenuStyle Inherits Style Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
type SubMenuStyle = class inherit Style interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 表示 控制項中子功能表的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style of a submenu in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來表示中的子功能表樣式控制項。Use the class to represent the style of a submenu in the control. 可以在靜態功能表或動態功能表中顯示子功能表。A submenu can be displayed within either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 靜態功能表項目會固定顯示在控制項，而只有當使用者將滑鼠指標在父功能表項目包含動態子功能表時，動態功能表的顯示。A static menu is always visible on a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 您可以使用下表中的屬性來指定靜態功能表和動態功能表中的子功能表的不同的樣式特性 （例如 字型和色彩）。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for the submenus within a static menu and a dynamic menu by using the properties in the following table. |子功能表項目樣式屬性Submenu item style property|描述Description| |---------------------------------|-----------------| ||動態功能表中子功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a submenu within a dynamic menu.| ||在靜態功能表內的子功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a submenu within a static menu.| 類別會繼承其成員的大部分`Style`類別。The class inherits most of its members from the `Style` class. 它會擴充`Style`類別提供控制的功能表項目文字周圍的空間數量的屬性。It extends the `Style` class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text. 使用屬性以控制左側和右側的功能表項目的文字。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同樣地，屬性會控制和功能表項目的文字底下的上述的空間量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 如需樣式繼承的設定的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . > [!NOTE] > 設定`z-index`藉由設定子功能表與相關聯的 HTML 物件子功能表樣式屬性。Set the `z-index` of HTML objects that are associated with a submenu by setting the property of the submenu style. `z-index`屬性定義堆疊順序呈現 HTML 的物件。The `z-index` attribute defines the stacking order of rendered HTML objects. 根據預設，動態功能表項目會具有預設 z-索引 (0) 的任何 HTML 物件上方出現。By default, dynamic menu items will appear above any HTML object that has the default z-index (0). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何指定動態功能表中子功能表的自訂樣式。The following example demonstrates how to specify a custom style for a submenu within a dynamic menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/CS/menudynamicmenustylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/VB/menudynamicmenustylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 這個建構函式通常使用於動態填入集合。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection. 它也可用在擴充類別，以初始化子功能表項目樣式屬性，例如或。It is also used when extending the class to initialize the submenu item style properties, such as or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.StateBag bag) cil managed

param.name: bag
param.span: 目前要求的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: The view-state information of the current request.

summary.span: 使用指定的檢視狀態資訊，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立新的物件要求的檢視狀態中包含的資訊。Use this constructor to create a new object with the information contained in the request's view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: The object to copy.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式屬性複製到 類別的目前執行個體中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用複製指定的樣式屬性的方法物件存放至呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 目前的執行個體中的所有屬性類別將會取代中指定的對應屬性物件。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要複製樣式屬性，而不會取代任何設定值，請使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void FillStyleAttributes (System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void FillStyleAttributes(class System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub FillStyleAttributes (attributes As CssStyleCollection, urlResolver As IUrlResolutionService)
protected: override void FillStyleAttributes(System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ attributes, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver);

param.name: attributes
param.span: 要加入樣式屬性的 物件。

span.span: The object to which to add the style properties.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 實作的物件，包含目前位置 (URL) 的內容資訊。

span.span: The -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

summary.span: 將 物件的樣式屬性加入指定的 物件中。

span.span: Adds the style properties of the object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將目前的執行個體的樣式屬性類別來指定物件。Use the method to add the style properties of the current instance of the class to the specified object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法僅供控制項開發人員使用。This method is used only by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit HorizontalPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.HorizontalPadding : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定子功能表的左右間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of a submenu.

value.span: 子功能表文字的左右間距。

span.span: The amount of space to the left and right of the text of a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制子功能表項目的文字和包含功能表的側邊之間的空間數量。Use the property to control the amount of space between the text of the submenu item and the side of the containing menu. 若要控制子功能表項目之間的垂直空間，請使用屬性。To control the vertical space between submenu items, use the property.

exception.span: 選取的值屬於 或是小於 0。

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

param.name: s
param.span: 要結合設定的 物件。

span.span: The object to combine settings with.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式屬性與 類別目前執行個體的樣式屬性結合。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將指定的樣式屬性合併物件的樣式屬性從呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 這個方法以設定每個屬性未設定在目前的聯結的樣式屬性物件及其對應的值，指定與物件。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 尚未設定的屬性將會更新。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果指定的屬性物件未設定，在目前的對應屬性物件不會變更。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 讓 類別的目前執行個體返回其原始狀態。

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來移除任何已定義的樣式項目從狀態包並重設物件為其原始狀態。Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state.

summary.span: 取得或設定子功能表的上下間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a submenu.
The amount of space above and below a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制之間的子功能表項目文字的垂直間距量。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space between the text of submenu items. 若要控制子功能表文字周圍的水平空間，請使用屬性。To control the horizontal space around submenu text, use the property.

exception.span: 選取的值屬於 或是小於 0。

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.
